result.title: Final report on Dissemination and Communication activities
result.description: The impacts of CD activities will be continuously monitored through an integrated analysis of quantitative performance indicators including outreach data to measure awareness and engagement indicators such as the Community Engagement Index CEI to measure the level of online interaction between the project contents and viewers and key qualitative assessment of stakeholders feedback The use of indicators will allow SocialRES to measure the effectiveness of its CD strategy through a scalable approach For this reason the Plan will be subject to one update in the course of the project task 65
